about_the_game:
Bang bang! It's creative time!

  • When you want to play or create a variety of DIY game ideas, Sandtable Engine will provide a lightweight game creativity and play platform!
  • "Sandtable Engine" is acompletely based on module engineering game program platform, the scene and gameplay in the game are completely realized by the module, you only need: load to play the module or create your own game module!



"All-in-one" module

  • Get a copy of the Sandtable Engine game ontology and unlock all engine-based gameplay features & creative possibilities!
  • As a player, you canexperience a wide variety of gameplay, just treat it as a game that supports independent mods, and all gameplay is based on game mods, which makes the "all-in-one" game experience possible!
  • As a developer, you can create your own game world through the map editor, combined with simple JavaScript programming, create completely independent gameplay mods!



Engine features

    For Player:
  • native support for multiplayer, the game module supports both single and multiplayer games (SteamP2P, Dedicated Server), players can also establish a host server (invite Steam friends to play together)
  • Perfect integration of players and mod development experience, If ordinary players have no creative needs, they can also play various mods directly
  • Very suitable for open world, SIMS, RPG, farm, ranch and other gameplay

    For Developer:
  • to highly custom game of ontology, including but not limited to the game world, UI interface, the public API script, etc
  • Lightweight development, no external IDE editor, can directly redefine the world through JavaScript
  • Open source repository, built-in thousands of creative resources (characters, vehicles, buildings, models, music, etc.)
  • Rich world API, at least one line of code can achieve create characters, vehicles, AI, modify world properties (weather, time), very suitable for quickly building game Demo
  • Built-in Map editor, can be directly within the game engine general maps, support creative workshop
  • The game module supports creative workshop and lightweight package sharing
  • Supports almost all game view modes (2.5D, first person, third person)
  • Support for importing and using external resources (models, pictures, audio, GUIs, game profiles, etc.)
  • More...



Create your game

  • If you have a clever game making idea, using Sandtable Engine will make your game creation journey full of shortcuts!
  • Sandtable world built-in rich resources and prefabricated features, developers only need to master some JavaScript knowledge, with the map editor to create the world!
  • Don't worry about support for game modeling, characters, vehicles, items, and pickup functions, which can be easily implemented in the engine with a few simple lines of code.
  • We are ready for developers rich resources, API and Wiki documentation, you just need to create a new\copy of the module, you can start free creation!



Official module

  • Sandtable Engine will be updated and officially released in 2024 iteration.
  • When the game is officially released, we will attach several official native modules (gameplay) for free, and provide complete engineering documents and source code, please look forward to paying attention!



Concept version

  • Still a little hesitant? It's totally okay!
  • After the game is officially launched, it will also provide [Demo concept edition] experience for free, which has no difference from the standard edition, only some basic restrictions on the number of online users, you can use it as a research review or experience Demo.
  • When you think the time is right, please consider purchasing [Standard Edition] to support us!



Geek spirit

  • We think it's a pleasure to be able to create and play games when we have enough energy, and it shouldn't be too limited by too many complexities or technical issues.
  • In the process of developing the "Sandtable Engine", we have done a lot of simplification and compatibility work, while maximizing the support functions of the engine as much as possible, do not have so many restrictions and concerns, in the process of light learning and play, boldly let go of creation!



More information

  • For more details and Wiki, please click store [Visit Website] to learn more!
detailed_description:
ANY IDEAS

Any ideas to get involved?
Sandtable Engine is a community project, so we don't have a lot of strong support.
If you're interested in helping make Sandtable Engine better, join our community and talk to us!

Would you like to try it first?
The official website of the Sandtable Engine will be regularly updated with the latest Beta version.
If you are interested in trying (imperfect content) in advance, welcome to visit website for the beta version!

Maybe we need:

  • Multilingual translation of games
  • Game module production and feedback
  • Game running test and feedback
  • Become an community developer
  • More, your thoughts...

Let's witness the growth together!

short_description: Welcome to the sandbox world full of creativity! With a free and open gameplay mode and a creative platform, whether you are a player or a developer, you can find highly scalable gameplay and game modes, or DIY your own game ideas here!
